short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides larger card previews for Altered cards on www.altered.gg

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Provides larger card previews for Altered cards on www.altered.gg

How to use:
- Install the extension
- Go to altered.gg (only works on the official website)
- Enjoy!

Support:
I don't plan on maintaining it nor improving it but I am open to any request. If someone wants to take over this little extension, feel free to reach me, I will open the source code on Github.
